name: Scorching Ash Form
components: S, M (a bit of gauze and a handful of ashes)
text: This spell functions like gaseous form, except the target becomes a visible swirl of hot ash and smoke instead of harmless translucent gas. The target gains the fire subtype. Any creature that begins its turn sharing a space with the target takes 2d6 points of fire damage and must make a Fortitude save (DC 15, + 1 per previous check) or suffer the effects of smoke inhalation.
mythicText:
The damage dealt increases to 3d6 points of fire damage. This otherwise makes the same changes as mythic gaseous form.

Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target can shift into or out of scorching ash form as a move action.
components_zh: 姿势, 材料 (一段薄纱和一把灰烬)
text_zh: 该法术的作用方式和‘气化形体 (gaseous form) ’一样，除了目标变化为可以看到的烟与粉尘组成的灼热漩涡而非透明缥缈的无害雾气。目标获得火系亚种。如果任何生物在自身的回合开始时与其共享一片空间的话，会受到2d6点火焰伤害，并且必须进行一次成功的强韧豁免检定 (DC 1 5, 每次检定再+1) 否则将会受到吸入浓烟的影响。
mythicText_zh:
造成的伤害增加至3d6点火焰伤害。其他方面改变与神话气化形体（gaseous form）做出的变化相同。

强化：若你花费2次神话之力，目标就能够以移动动作变为焚云形态，或者恢复为正常的形态。
